title: Be the One - Dua Lipa
text: I love Blow Your Mind, but I wish she would release a clean version! Mwah curled up into a small ball in the corner by Poppet312 Cringeworthy. Every single time she says "mwah", I shake my head repeatedly (hopefully killing the brain cells I need to listen to this song) while curling up into a small ball and start rocking back and forth preferably in a corner. Mw rrrgghhh *vomits* by Vorby Poppet312, you are s right. I'm also rocking in a corner, having already locked the door, glued the windows shut and rid my house of every radio within a 6-mile radius. I had high hopes for this Dua Lipa person, but she obviously lets her high opinion of herself get in the way of anything that could have been good. Please, Dua Lipa, release something unique before I lose hope completely - I haven't quite given up, but I get a little closer to doing so every time Capital plays this song. Disappointing. Biography Born: 22 August 1995 in London, England Genre: Pop Years Active: '10s Indie pop singer Dua Lipa showcased a throwback vibe and knack for catchy pop with soulful grit, much like Sia, Jessie J, or P!nk, and a slyly rebellious air like Charli XCX and Marina & the Diamonds. Born and raised in London to Kosovar-Albanian parents, the sultry-voiced pop singer attended Sylvia Young Theater School (Rita Ora, Amy Winehouse) until the age of 13, when she moved to Kosovo with her family. However, the move wouldn't last very long, as she was back in London by age 15, living on...   Dua Lipa 1.
